snippet.title: Eville "Who will Burn?" Teaser
snippet.description:
Rejoice, oh citizens of Eville! 
Feast your eyes on this latest audiovisual marvel; behold, the latest teaser, "Who Will Burn?".

Have you patiently been awaiting more Eville content, or are you simply Eville-curious? No matter! Satiate your palette with the trials and tribulations of everyday citizens in this short and succinct teaser made specifically for your viewing pleasure. 

**Play the Demo throughout the duration of the Steam Winter Festival from Feb 3rd, 10 am - Feb 9th, 10 am (PST)**

Art thou sus? 

Eville is a murder mystery social deduction game inspired by the popular cardgame Werewolves. In Eville you take on the role of either a villager in which case you need to try and unravel the mystery behind the series of murders happening in your village. In the other case, you play as the murderer walking amongst the villagers. Your objective is to create chaos by murdering villagers and turning one against the other. The game can be won by either capturing and executing the murderer(s) or eliminating all villagers. One of each camp has to be eliminated.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1220170/Eville/

Join the Discord: http://discord.eville-game.com/
Website: http://eville-game.com/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/eville
Twitter: https://twitter.com/eville_game
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eville_game/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@evillegame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EvilleGameOfficial
